org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.types

Interface InventoryRow

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Inventory, Inventory2D, java.lang.Iterable<Inventory>, Nameable, OrderedInventory
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Hotbar

    public interface InventoryRow
extends Inventory2D
    Represents a row within a GridInventory.
